summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 29 and 30, Carleton Park Addition, and in Block 5, Briarcliff Addition No. 2, being the alley between 42nd Avenue West and West Viewmont Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 12335 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
